verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] El <S%H7799>Shoshannim;<s%> Eduth. A Psalm of Asaph.) Oh, <S%H238>give<s%> <S%H238>ear,<s%> <S%H7462>Shepherd<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> Thou who dost <S%H5090>lead<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> like a <S%H6629>flock;<s%> Thou who art <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> [above] the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> <S%H3313>shine<s%> <S%H3313>forth!<s%>
<S%H6440>Before<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> and <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H5782>stir<s%> up Thy <S%H1369>power,<s%> And <S%H1980>come<s%> to <S%H3444>save<s%> us!
O <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> us, And cause Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> [upon us], and we will be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> [of] <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H4970>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt Thou be <S%H6225>angry<s%> with the <S%H8605>prayer<s%> of Thy <S%H5971>people<s%>?

Thou hast <S%H398>fed<s%> them with the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of <S%H1832>tears,<s%> And Thou hast <S%H8248>made<s%> them to <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H1832>tears<s%> in <S%H9605>large<s%> <S%H9605>measure.<s%>
Thou dost <S%H7760>make<s%> us an <S%H4066>object<s%> of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to our <S%H7934>neighbors;<s%> And our <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H3932>laugh<s%> among themselves.
O <S%H430>God<s%> [of] <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> us, And cause Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> [upon us,] and we will be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
Thou didst <S%H5265>remove<s%> a <S%H1612>vine<s%> from <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> Thou didst <S%H1644>drive<s%> out the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> and didst <S%H5193>plant<s%> it.
Thou didst <S%H6437>clear<s%> [the ground] <S%H6440>before<s%> it, And it <S%H8327>took<s%> <S%H8328>deep<s%> <S%H8328>root<s%> and <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H776>land.<s%>
The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> were <S%H3680>covered<s%> with its <S%H6738>shadow;<s%> And the <S%H730>cedars<s%> of <S%H410>God<s%> with its <S%H6057>boughs.<s%>
It was <S%H7971>sending<s%> out its <S%H9524>branches<s%> to the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> And its <S%H3127>shoots<s%> to the <S%H5104>River.<s%>
<S%H4100>Why<s%> hast Thou <S%H6555>broken<s%> <S%H6555>down<s%> its <S%H1447>hedges,<s%> So that <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H5674>pass<s%> [that] <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H717>pick<s%> its [fruit]?
A <S%H2386>boar<s%> from the <S%H9194>forest<s%> <S%H3765>eats<s%> it <S%H3765>away,<s%> And <S%H2123>whatever<s%> <S%H2123>moves<s%> in the <S%H9583>field<s%> <S%H7462>feeds<s%> on it.

O <S%H430>God<s%> [of] <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> we <S%H4994>beseech<s%> Thee; <S%H5027>Look<s%> <S%H5027>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H7200>see,<s%> and <S%H6485>take<s%> <S%H6485>care<s%> of <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H1612>vine,<s%>
Even the <S%H3657>shoot<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> has <S%H5193>planted,<s%> And on the <S%H1121>son<s%> whom Thou hast <S%H553>strengthened<s%> for Thyself.
It is <S%H8313>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> it is <S%H3683>cut<s%> <S%H3683>down;<s%> They perish at the <S%H6>rebuke<s%> of Thy <S%H1606>countenance.<s%>

Let Thy <S%H3027>hand<s%> be upon the <S%H376>man<s%> of Thy <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand,<s%> Upon the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> whom Thou didst <S%H553>make<s%> <S%H553>strong<s%> for Thyself.
Then we shall not <S%H5472>turn<s%> <S%H5472>back<s%> from Thee; <S%H2421>Revive<s%> us, and we will <S%H7121>call<s%> upon Thy <S%H8034>name.<s%>
O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H7725>restore<s%> us; Cause Thy <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> [upon us,] and we will be <S%H3467>saved.<s%>
